name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta. Rich and creamy without any cream!
author: Chef Mario
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Meanwhile, cook pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
Add garlic to the pancetta and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta and toss to combine.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, tossing constantly.
Add pasta water gradually until sauce is creamy and coats the pasta.
Garnish with parsley and additional cheese before serving.
